docs.title: Welcome to Adaly's User Manual
docs.text: Here you will find step by step tutorials guiding you through the basics of how to use Adaly

docs.title: Configure Civic Science Connector
docs.text:
1. Navigate to the homepage

2. Click Integrations.

3. Click "My Connectors"

4. Click the gear icon.

5. Click "Configure"

6. Click the "Username" field.

7. Enter your username

8. Click the "Password" field.

9. Enter your password

10. Click "Authenticate"

11. Click "Finish"

docs.title: Change Your Name
docs.text:
1. Hover over your Profile Picture in the top right

2. Click "Account Settings"

3. Click "Change" under your Name

4. Enter your new name, and press Enter to confirm the change

docs.title: Change Your Password
docs.text:
1. Hover over your Profile Picture in the top right

2. Click "Account Settings"

3. Click "Change Password"

4. Click the "Enter your old password" field and enter your current password.

5. Click the "Enter your new password" field and enter your new password.

6. Click the "Re-enter your new password" field and re-enter your new password.

7. Click "Save"
